d23343bd-1c1e-464c-9e0b-91fa714287bd.description: Earners of the Empathetic Leadership in the Workplace Level 1 Certificate, offered by Courageous Leadership Alliance, INC., have learned the essential practices and tools designed to increase leadership self-awareness, emotional intelligence and to create a business model that embraces empathetic principles. The 15-hour research based program focuses on ways for organizations to create diverse workplaces, highlight empathy as a skill, and measurable steps to cultivating empathetic leadership.
d23343bd-1c1e-464c-9e0b-91fa714287bd.name: Empathetic Leadership Certificate Program - LEVEL 1

issuer.summary: issued by Courageous Leadership Alliance, INC.

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge must complete the Empathetic Leadership in the Workplace Level 1 Certificate, offered by Courageous Leadership Alliance, INC. during an in-person class or virtual cohort.

Earners of this badge must complete all four, two-hour modules: (1) Why Empathetic Leadership, (2) Empathy as a Leadership Skill In Business, (3) Steps Organizations Must Take to Cultivate Empathetic Leadership, and (4) Creating an Empathetic Mindset.

In this 15 hours of interactive training, each badge earner participated in real-world scenarios leading to self-discovery. Leaders who have earned this badge have experienced practical and systemic learning, gaining the knowledge, skills, abilities, and experiences to enhance their leadership abilities.

278dbb76-3699-4bb6-b771-c94a80f75eb0.description: The earner of this badge is able to demonstrate ten Empathetic Leadership competencies which are taught through experiential learning using the Kolb's Cycle of Learning. In this 50 hours of dynamic training, the earner led live student cohorts, developed lesson plans and led real-world scenarios. Earners of this badge have experienced practical and systemic learning – gaining the knowledge, skills, and abilities to enhance their facilitation experience.
278dbb76-3699-4bb6-b771-c94a80f75eb0.name: Empathetic Leadership Certificate - Facilitator

issuer.summary: issued by Courageous Leadership Alliance, INC.

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge completed the Courageous Leadership Alliance, INC. Empathetic Leadership Level III Certificate Program and demonstrated an ability to instruct outcomes using John Dewey's Learning Module and Kolb's Cycle of learning. During the 1.5-hour facilitator validation, the earner was required to show the competence of factual (what), conceptual (why), and procedural (how) knowledge in each of the ten modules.

Earners of the badge have completed ten modules of the Empathetic Leadership Certificate program: (1) Why Empathetic Leadership, (2) Empathy As A Leadership Skill, (3) Steps to Cultivate Empathetic Leadership, (4) Creating an Empathetic Mindset, (5) Measurable Benefits of Empathetic Leadership, (6) Creating Community and Connection, (7) Communicating with Empathy (8) Building a Culture of Empathetic Leadership, (9) Creating Policies and Programs, and (10) The Power of Empathetic Organizations.

Earners of this badge have at least two years of teaching, facilitation, coaching, curriculum, or instructor experience. Badge earners also have a minimum of a four year undergraduate degree and at least five years of leadership experience.
